title: Republicans Target a Top House Democrat as Winds Shift to the Right
description: Representative Sean Patrick Maloney of New York is in charge of protecting the House Democratsâ€™ majority. But now he finds himself at real risk in his own Hudson Valley district.
dc:creator: Katie Glueck
media:credit: Lauren Lancaster for The New York Times
media:description: Representative Sean Patrick Maloney holds a voter turnout event in Bedford Hills, N.Y., on Saturday.
